Hello, fellow Tripleclickers

This is just a little site I built for myself and to any of you, that'll help us search up any games (and potentially other media) discussed by Maddy, Jason and Kirk. I am definitely not promising that it's comprehensive, but I hope that it's helpful!

Scope

So, I quickly gave up on trying to list literally every game mentioned. That's not the purpose of this site. What I want is to be able to find the episodes in which our beloved hosts discuss a game to some arbitrary extend that I have made up myself and which is entirely arbitrary and likely completely inconsisteent. However, I won't include games that are just lightly glanced over.

Next is, that I will only be differentiating between games being discussed as part of the main section and as part of One More Thing. Figure out exactly when it's discussed is up you.
